description: Certificate of lawfulness for the proposed use of the residential property as the operating address for a private hire operator license issued by TFL
decision_conditions: Planning permission will not be required for a use of the nature described as part of the information submitted with this application operating from this address. Specifically:
- Not more than one room within the dwelling would be used for administrative tasks associated with the use of the property as the operating address for a private hire operator license
- No one except the applicant would be working within the property
- No clients, drivers, or members of the public will visit the property in relation to its use as an operating address for a private hire operator license
- There will be no signage, advertisements, or other commercial displays installed at the property

Based on the above, planning permission would not be required. However, it is worth noting that should the circumstances relating to the business alter in any respect this may change the requirements for planning permission and you should contact the Council for confirmation of these matters. The onus remains on
